REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1576 reute r f BC-TENNECO-<TGT>-BUYS-UN 03-30 0048

TEXT.TITLE: TENNECO <TGT> BUYS UNISYS <UIS> UNIT
TEXT.BODY: Tenneco Inc said its Newport News Shipbuilding subsidiary has completed the purchase of the Sperry Marine Systems division of Unisys Corp for about 70 mln dlrs. Sperry Marine has annual revenues of about 100 mln dlrs. Reuter
